title: Gargoyles
brief_description: Gargoyles is an American cartoon series produced by Disney Television Animation and Buena Vista Television that features Shakespearean themes.

constellations_other.name: Sweet Country
constellations_other.description: Warwick Thorntonâ€™s feature film Sweet Country is based on the story of Wilaberta Jack, which was told to sound recordist David Tranter by his grandfather and translated into storyboards.

description: In Scotland, 994 A.D. Goliath and his clan of gargoyles defend a medieval castle. In present day, David Xanatos buys the castle and moves it to New York City. When the castle is attacked the gargoyles are awakened from a 1000 year curse.
description_for_label: In Scotland, 994 A.D. Goliath and his clan of gargoyles defend a medieval castle. In present day, David Xanatos buys the castle and moves it to New York City. When the castle is attacked the gargoyles are awakened from a 1000 year curse.
